description: Leading cross-functional collaboration across engineering, product, and business teams to align technical execution with organizational goals.
Owning project leadership, architecture definition and design, and tech strategy, ensuring scalable and maintainable system designs.
Actively contributing to core systems across platform, devops, product, data and tech strategy, driving hands-on development while solving technical challenges.
Mentoring junior engineers, fostering a culture of learning, best practices, and collaboration.
Driving framework thinking and optimization, improving system performance, resource utilization, and overall efficiency.
Design and development of Collections (Notice Generation and Dispatch) Module.
Involved in the design, implementation and management of Data Governance, compliance, monitoring, alerting, reporting and automation around the product module.
Implement and Overview all third party integrations to the tool.
Architecture, developent and delivery of SAAS implementation
Developed APIs for MIS reports and Product Dashboards, implemented the e-invoicing module.
Implementation of end to end computer vision and text analytics retail use case solutions for the auto label tool on the platform.
[ Data Gathering > cleaning > model training > API > Containerization > Deployment ]
